paper_abstract: We present a Curry-style second-roder type system with union and intersection types for the lambda-calculus with constructors of Arbiser, Miquel and Rios, an extensin of lambda-calculus with a pattern matching mechanism for variadic constructors. We then prove the strong normalisation and the absence of match failure for a restriction of this system, by adapting the standard reducibility method.
paper_title: SEMANTICS OF TYPED LAMBDA-CALCULUS WITH CONSTRUCTORS
